sources.title: When Knights Were Bold (1941)
sources.description: A king locks up his daughter in a castle, forbidding her to see Robin Hood again, though he deftly defies the King and his men, and giant along the way. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/when-knights-were-bold-1941/

metadata.Plot: A king locks up his daughter in a castle, forbidding her to see Robin Hood again, though he deftly defies the King and his men, and giant along the way.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Isadore Klein, Tom Morrison
